title: Under Pressure
description: Edit the urgent message while avoiding enemy patrols.
objective: Fix all errors quickly. Spies are watching!
quote:
The enemy is close.
There's no time for hesitation.

Edit fast. Delete faster.
One wrong move and it's over.
victory_quote:
Message sent. Evidence destroyed.
You made it out just in time.

You've mastered the art of editing under fire.
The Commander will be pleased.
lore:
URGENT: Enemy patrols have been spotted
in the communications room.

You must correct this critical message
before they find you.

Use 'dw' to delete words quicklyâ€”
it's faster than repeated 'x' presses.

Time is not on your side.
